  • Return Center
  • Return by Mail

Here’s everything you need to know about returning your item(s)

Conveniently return your item by mail following the instructions below.

Policy

Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchange. Some items may have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy.

Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Items with Specific Return Requirements

Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.

Valid Driver's License

or

State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Exceptions

See Vendors List

Requirements

We have a "no quibble" policy when it comes to recalls. When a product is recalled, we believe the most important thing is to get that product out of children's hands.

  • Toys"R"Us and Babies"R"Us stores will take back recalled products sold at a Toys"R"Us or Babies"R"Us store or our e-commerce sites at any point during the recall period.

There are some exceptions to this policy, please check with your local store for more details.

What to expect:

  • No receipt or proof of purchase is necessary to return a recalled product to one of our stores.
  • If you do not have a receipt, you will receive a store credit for the lowest sale price of the product within the last 30 days.

Here’s everything you need to know about returning your item(s)

Conveniently return your item by mail following the instructions below.

Policy

Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchange. Some items may have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy.

Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Items with Specific Return Requirements

Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.

Valid Driver's License

or

State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Exceptions

See Vendors List

Requirements

To return a damaged or defective item, please contact our customer service team by phone:

  • TRU: 1-800-869-7787
  • BRU: 1-888-222-9787

Our customer service team will provide you with a prepaid return label and shipping instructions. Once we receive the item and have validated the damage/defect, you will be refunded the price of the item as well as any applicable taxes and shipping costs.

What to expect:

Refunds will be issued in the original form of payment used to purchase the item.

Refunds are credited once the item has been received and are generally available within 2 weeks of mailing your return. Please know that your bank may take several days to release the funds to your account.

Here’s everything you need to know about returning your item(s)

Conveniently return your item by mail following the instructions below.

Since you would like to return to store:

Policy

  • Most unopened and unused items can be returned within 90 days of purchase for a refund or exchange. Some items may have different policies associated with them. Click here for a list of exceptions to our 90 day policy.
  • Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Items with Specific Return Requirements

  • Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund. If the packages have been opened, the items may only be exchanged for the identical items or titles.

Valid Driver's License

or

State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Exceptions

See Vendors List

Requirements

When mailing your return to our Returns Center:

  • Items must be returned, in new, unused condition, and in its original packaging, and with all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.
  • Please remove any personal information or data from your item before sending.
  • If returning an item that was part of a larger Bundle, please return all associated items. We are unable to refund on individual items.

Steps to create your label:

  • Go to Returns Portal
  • Enter your Ship ID/Tracking number.
  • Select the item you want to return from the available items ordered online.
  • Print out the pre-paid return label.
  • Repackage items and include the packing slip in the package.
  • Affix the printed label to your package and mail it via the United States Postal Service.

What to expect:

Online purchases returned within 90 days to our online Returns Center by mail and in “new” condition will receive a refund of the price of the item and any applicable taxes will be issued in the original form of payment used to purchase the item. See info below for items purchased with Pay in Store.

It normally takes 5-10 days for the returned item to arrive and be processed by the Returns Center.

Refunds are credited upon the item being processed and are generally available within 2 weeks of mailing your return. Please know that your bank may take several days to release the funds to your account.

Credit Card + TRU Gift Card Credit Card and eGift Card Rewards points Any Rewards points used will be refunded
Payment Method Refund Method
Credit Card Credit Card
Gift Card Gift eCard
Debit Card Debit Card
PayPal PayPal Acct
Credit Card + TRU Gift Card Credit Card and eGift Card
Rewards points Any Rewards points used will be refunded

Gift Return

When completing the prepaid label process there are two credit options:

  • A merchandise credit/gift card will be given after validating:

    1. Have the refund less the cost of the return shipping credited back to the purchaser’s original form of payment.
    2. Choose to have an eGift Card emailed to you, the gift recipient, in the amount of the original purchase price less the cost of the return shipping.

Pay In Store

  • Pay in Store items returned to the Online Returns Center will receive an eGift Card in the amount of the original purchase price. This eGift Card can be brought to any TRU/BRU store to have the amount refunded to the original form of payment.

Return Item Where Free Gift Card/Promo Item Was Received With Purchase

  • Any product that is returned without a promotional item(s) that was included with the original transaction (e.g., buy a game console, get a free gift card) will have the value of the promotional item deducted from the refund amount.

Return Fee Schedule

A flat shipping fee determined by size, weight, and freight class will be deducted automatically from the item refund. Below are the label fees with the estimated package weight that qualifies for each one. The actual fee will be shown during the label creation process:

  • $7.95 - Small parcels ( < 5lbs.)
  • $11.95 - Medium parcel (>5lbs. and <70lbs.)
  • $99.95 - Large items that were special delivered (>70lbs.)

To initiate or track your pre-paid online return, please click here.

Returns not meeting the return criteria may be returned to the customer without crediting a refund or may be issued a partial refund.

Valid ID Required

To ensure that we can provide a fair return policy and service to our customers, one of the below valid forms of ID is required:

  • Valid Driver's License
  • State Identification from US, US Territories, Canada, or Mexico

Shipping costs are not refunded for online returns.

Steps to create your shipping label

  1. 1

    Enter your Ship ID/Tracking number.

  2. 2

    Select the item you want to return from the available items ordered online.

  3. 3

    Print out the pre-paid return label.

  4. 4

    Repackage items and include the packing slip in the package.

  5. 5

    Repackage items and include the packing slip in the package.

Items must be returned, in new, unsused condition, and in its original packaging, and wiht all paperwork including manuals, assembly instructions and your packing slip, as well as all accessories to ensure full credit.

Pre-recorded movies & music; computer & video game software; trading cards; and breast pumps must be returned in its original, sealed and unopened packages along with an in-store receipt or online packing slip for refund.
